meanings.definition: A chief or leader of a Native American tribe.
meanings.sent1: The sagamore led his tribe on the hunt.
meanings.sent2: The sagamore was respected by all the tribe members.
meanings.sent3: The sagamore tried to dance but tripped over his own feet.
meanings.sent4: The sagamore's wisdom guided the tribe through tough times.
meanings.sent5: The sagamore's headdress marked him as the leader of the tribe.

meanings.definition: A title of respect or honor among certain Native American tribes.
meanings.sent1: The elders bestowed the title of sagamore upon him.
meanings.sent2: She wore the sagamore title with pride.
meanings.sent3: The sagamore title made him feel important.
meanings.sent4: The sagamore title was like a shining badge of honor.
meanings.sent5: The sagamore title carried great significance in the tribe.

meanings.definition: A sachem or chief of a Native American tribe.
meanings.sent1: The sagamore presided over tribal meetings.
meanings.sent2: The sachem was also known as the sagamore.
meanings.sent3: The sagamore's hat blew off in the strong wind.
meanings.sent4: The sagamore's voice echoed through the village.
meanings.sent5: The sagamore's presence commanded respect from all.
